tool_description:
WHOIS information in JSON format:
Domain / IP address / Network / ASN
name: whois-json
title: whois-json

api_list.name: WHOIS
api_list.description:
get whois JSON-formatted data using /whois/**name** query, the **name** parameter can be one of:
- Domain name
- IP address
- Network
- ASN
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-json2.p.rapidapi.com/whois/google.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-json2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-json2.p.rapidapi.com/whois/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-json2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
